content: chain 1 single_crochet in next 7 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space single_crochet in next 6 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet 54 single_crochet r11 chain 1 single_crochet in next 8 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4 *single_crochet in second space single_crochet in next 7 sps 2 single_crochet in chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to first single_crochet 60 single_crochet r12 slip_stitch into next space chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 6 sps decrease next 2 sps chain 4 slip_stitch in middle of chain 4 space chain 4 *double_crochet in second space double_crochet in next 6 sps decrease next 2 sps chain 4 slip_stitch in middle of chain 4 space chain 4* slip_stitch to chain 3 6 decrease 42 double_crochet r13 slip_stitch into next space chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 sps decrease next 2 sps chain 4 slip_stitch in middle of chain 4 space - repeat once chain 4 *double_crochet in second space double_crochet in next 4 sps decrease next 2 sps chain 4 sl st in middle of chain 4 space - repeat once chain 4* slip_stitch to chain 3 6 decrease 30 double_crochet r14 slip_stitch into next space chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 sps decrease next 2 sps chain 4 slip_stitch in middle of chain 4 space - repeat twice chain 4 *double_crochet in second space double_crochet in next 2 sps decrease next 2 sps chain 4 sl st in middle of chain 4 space - repeat twice chain 4* slip_stitch to chain 3 6 decrease 18 double_crochet r15 slip_stitch into next space chain 3 decrease next 2 sps makes dc3tog chain 4 slip_stitch in middle of chain 4 space - repeat 3 times chain 4 *dc3tog on top of flower starting in second space chain 4 slip_stitch in middle of chain 4 space - repeat 3 times chain 4* slip_stitch to dc3tog 6 dc3tog disclaimer please credit myself as the rightful owner no selling or distributing of pattern if you wish to collaborate please email me at craftyhookup@gmail com
